articles.title: Philippines' top diplomat swears at China online, tells nation to leave disputed waters - The Online Citizen Asia
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia Philippines' top diplomat swears at China online, tells nation to leave disputed waters Asia
articles.content:
The Philippines’ top diplomat unambiguously told Beijing where to go on Monday, as the government insisted Chinese vessels were still illegally lingering in the disputed South China Sea.
“China, my … [+2162 chars]
